title: (x) 'Vocal Touch' businesscard - Mistral, Bradley Hand {Craig}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202043958im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vt_B-card_3757.jpg)

Especially the parts; Vocal Touch or Elenita Sportel  
The sub text pertaining to the Adres and Telefoon are also very welcome

Thanks!!
author: obrowne

comments.content: The bigger text is [Mistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202043958/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/mistral/fonts/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DVocal%2520Touch%2520Elenita%2520Sportel%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D22), with the name stretched horizontally.

Thanks for your speedy reply and help eliason.  
Regards...  
Orlando

You're welcome. I think the smaller text is [Bradley Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202043958/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bradley-hand-itc/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D76%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTuinbouwstraat%2520Groningen%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D33) - it too has been stretched in places.

the larger copy is also staccato222

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202043958/http:/www.thefontry.com/)

Staccato 222 is Bitstreamâ€™s version of Mistral.  
Basically the same typeface.

^^^^Yes, what he said...

I seem to recall it was Mistral in the old Chartpak letters.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202043958/http:/www.thefontry.com/)

Hi everyone,

You've been a great help.  
Thanks again...  
I've gone forward with the Mistral font.

Worked like a charm!
